mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM (SELECT * FROM ht_borrow_apicron a WHERE a.api_type = 0 ) api JOIN ht_borrow b ON api.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid AND (b.`status` = 4 OR b.`status` = 5) AND b.plan_nid IS NULL JOIN ht_borrow_info info ON b.borrow_nid = info.borrow_nid

if.test: statusSearch != null and statusSearch!='' and statusSearch != 9

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ht_tender_commission tc LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_tender t ON tc.tender_id= t.id LEFT JOIN ht_r_user u ON u.user_id= tc.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow b ON b.borrow_nid= tc.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_plan hhp ON hhp.plan_nid = tc.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_r_user u2 ON u2.user_id= tc.tender_user_id LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_accede hha ON hha.accede_order_id = tc.ordid WHERE 1=1 AND tc.commission > 0

SELECT sum(tc.account_tender) AS tenderTotle, sum(tc.commission) AS commissionTotle FROM ht_tender_commission tc LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_tender t ON tc.tender_id = t.id LEFT JOIN ht_r_user u ON u.user_id = tc.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow b ON b.borrow_nid = tc.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_plan hhp ON hhp.plan_nid = tc.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_r_user u2 ON u2.user_id = tc.tender_user_id LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_accede hha ON hha.accede_order_id = tc.ordid WHERE 1=1 AND tc.commission > 0
SELECT CASE d.cuttype WHEN 1 THEN 3 WHEN 2 THEN 2 ELSE 0 END as cuttype FROM ht_r_oa_users ou INNER JOIN ht_r_oa_department d on ou.departmentid= d.id WHERE ou.hyd_id= #{userId}
